caption.center: THOMAS PAUL ARNETT, APPELLANT, v. STATE OF FLORIDA, APPELLEE.

court.center: District Court of Appeal of Florida, Fifth District.

opinion.posture: Appeal from the Circuit Court for Seminole County; Alan A. Dickey, Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
Richard I. Wallsh of Troum Wallsh, Winter Park, for appellant.
Robert A. Butterworth, Atty. Gen., Tallahassee and Barbara Arlene Fink, Asst. Atty. Gen., Daytona Beach, for appellee.
opinion.opinion_text:
AFFIRMED. See Gladfelter v. State, 618 So.2d 1364 (Fla. 1993); State v. Sanderson, 625 So.2d 471 (Fla. 1993); ยง775.089(3)(b)(2), Fla. Stat. (1991).
DAUKSCH, GRIFFIN and THOMPSON, JJ., concur.
